description: The ReportDash Datastore MCP (Model Context Protocol) server provides a standardized interface for AI assistants to query your connected advertising and analytics platforms including Facebook Ads, Google Ads, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok, and more.

configSchema.name: datastore
configSchema.description: Connect to ReportDash Datastore for instant access to your marketing analytics

capabilities.name: list_sources
capabilities.description: List connected sources for the authenticated user

capabilities.name: describe_table
capabilities.description: Return schema metadata for a table (columns and its types).

capabilities.name: query_table
capabilities.description: Run a read-only query against one table using a structured query object. Supports selecting columns, applying filters, grouping and aggregating metrics, ordering results, and limiting rows. Raw SQL is not accepted.

capabilities.name: list_views
capabilities.description: List all available Datastore views. Views are curated, unified datasets that combine multiple sourcesâ€”either across platforms (e.g., Google Ads + Facebook Ads) or within the same platform (e.g., multiple Google Ads accounts).

capabilities.name: describe_view
capabilities.description: Return schema metadata for a data view (columns and its types).

capabilities.name: query_view
capabilities.description: Run a read-only query against one view using a structured query object. Supports selecting columns, applying filters, ordering results, and limiting rows. Raw SQL is not accepted. Grouping and aggregate not supported.
